subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing

------=_NextPart_000_0015_01C9BB54.1EC58D40

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Exactly.

Thanks Al!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: threadsintyme=
@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, April 12, 2009 6:=
26 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing






  April,

  What y=
our saying is that the entity should be questioned and then the veracity of=
 their statements need to be proven before one believes that the communicat=
ion that is being passed to you is accurate. This means that their statemen=
ts must be veridical. This is the same path that I chose when I was develop=
ing as a medium. It works...but it takes a lot of time and effort on everyo=
ne's part. 

  Great ideas, April!!

  Al

  ---------- Original Message --=
--------
  From: "April Abercrombie" <april@...>
 =
 To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing=

  Date: Sat, 11 Apr 2009 19:28:25 -0600




  That's what I mean by first =
establishing that the spirit has given me trustworthy info consistently. If=
 it hasn't, then the experiment stops there, at least with that entity.

  =
But this is all AFTER I have proven that I am even conversing with an entit=
y of course.

  April

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: threadsi=
ntyme@... 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, April =
11, 2009 4:58 PM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing



    Apri=
l,

    What if the spirit lies? Or fails to tell the truth?
    Al
    ---=
------- Original Message ----------
    From: "April Abercrombie" <april@ab=
ercrombieghostresearch.com>
    To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
    Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing
    Date: Sat, 11 Apr 2009 16:55:22 -0600=





    I would try it both ways -solo and with another person. However I =
would limit it to just me and one other trustworthy person.


    "How woul=
d you go about determining/verified whether it's a ghost (someone stuck in =
between life and the other side), a spirit (someone that's crossed over and=
 came back to say high) and some other type of entity?"

    Only after est=
ablishing that I am indeed communicating with a spirit, and that spirit has=
 given me trustworthy info consistently, at that point I would simply ask w=
hat it's nature is.

    April

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      F=
rom: lori bogren 
      To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, =
April 11, 2009 2:48 PM
      Subject: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing


     =
 April~
       
      Are you planning on doing this solo or working with a=
 team?
       
      How would you go about determining/verified whether it=
's a ghost (someone stuck in between life and the other side), a spirit (so=
meone that's crossed over and came back to say high) and some other type of=
 entity?
       
      ~Lori




      "My life is boring, my fantasies are=
 a theme park." 
      --Anne Rice  Responding to an interviewer who just d=
id not get it. 



        




-------------------------------------------=
-------------------------------
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      Fro=
m: april@...
      Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2009 22:37:13=
 -0600
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunte=
r stuff.





      Well, if my husband would let me actually experiment wi=
th one, that would be the first step LOL!

      But what I would try and d=
o is get some kind of verifiable information from the "entity" that I conta=
ct with the board to prove that it is communication from an actual, intelli=
gent being and not just my own motor responses making he planchette move. I=
t would have to be information that I have no knowledge of.

      If I cou=
ld do that, and consistently, then I would be comfortable saying that I am =
actually talking to a spirit.

      The reason I have my doubts is that yo=
u have to be touching the planchette to get it to move. If it were an actua=
l spirit, I would think that shouldn't be necessary. We all know ghosts can=
 a do move objects.

      But this brings up another mystery - if the Ouij=
a board is actual spirit communication, maybe there is a difference between=
 the entities you can contact with it and your common ghost.

      April

=
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: lori bogren 
        To=
: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009 9:50 PM
   =
     Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.=



        April~
         
        Hm, finally I'm intrigued again.
      =
   
        How do you about the process?
         
        ~Lori




     =
   "My life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
        --Anne Rice=
  Responding to an interviewer who just did not get it. 



          




=
------------------------------------------------------------------------
  =
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
        From: april@abercrombieghostresea=
rch.com
        Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2009 18:36:30 -0600
        Subject: Re: =
[EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.


        .


   =
     When it comes to the Ouija, I just want to study it to find out if it =
is really spirit communication, or just kinetic energy or your subconscious=
 mind moving the planchette.

        I agree that we all have the ability =
for extra sensory perception, just some are better at it than others. Like =
running, for instance. We all can run, but some are naturally better at it.=
 Still, with practice we can get better.

        But that is not my aim wi=
th the Ouija.


          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: lor=
i bogren 
          To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, Ap=
ril 10, 2009 6:11 PM
          Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the=
 usual ghost hunter stuff.


          April~
           
          You for=
got yawn from boredom, that's what I do.
           
          Use it, don'=
t use it.  I don't care.  But why bother.  When people ask me I usually sug=
gest that if they want to communicate with ... whatever why not develop the=
 ability yourself.  - ya, I'm one of those who believe anyone can.
        =
   
          There's always the question in the back of your mind whether =
your partner's moving it.  The intentions of "what" you are talking to.  No=
t to mention it's too slow and limited.
           
          Besides if yo=
u take the time to develop the ability you can get more texture in the info=
rmation.  Asking the board "where you married?" may get you a "yes" but a p=
sychic might get the sense of a religious or civil ceremonhy, the garment(s=
) worn, other's in the party, or whether that Being approved/disapproved of=
 their spouse (ie was it a reluctant union).
           
          ~Lori
